products.title: Utopia Sand Vertical Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a vertical blind that's neutral and holds a lot of class, this utopia sand vertical blind should be at the top of your list. Not only is it a soft beige-cream colour, but it's free from bottom chains for a smarter look. There's no need to worry about your if you're looking for a vertical blind that's neutral and holds a lot of class, this utopia sand vertical blind should be at the top of your list.

products.title: Utopia Mist Vertical Blind
products.description: This utopia mist vertical blind is the very softest of greys almost white and each vane perfectly woven to allow a gentle stream of light to bathe your home in a warm and inviting glow. Perfect for a modern home, the blind will give you a smart, sophisticated and streamlined this utopia mist vertical blind is the very softest of greys almost white and each vane perfectly woven to allow a gentle stream of light to bathe your home in a warm and inviting glow.

products.title: Utopia Country Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: Utopia country grey is an accurate name for this vertical blind thats bursting with elegant colouring and tasteful texture. products.title: Utopia Slate Grey Vertical Blind

products.title: Roma, Bahia - Vertical Blind
products.description: Both pretty and warm, the roma in bahia is a finely woven filter blind allows light to gently trickle through, whilst providing a blast of country colour wherever it's used. Deftly hanging louvres can be easily tilted and pulled across to open or close the blind, allowing you as much or as little light as you please. Place the bahia in a child's bedroom, where it will match fun wallpapers and furniture in bold primary colours; or create a fresh, vibrant colour scheme in the office, where white walls and medium woods will set it off perfectly.

products.title: Roma, Polar - Vertical Blind
products.description: Not quite mint, yet not quite aqua either, the roma in polar is a unique, icy green shade that will add a cool sophisticated to your home dcor. Soft but sturdy cotton-feel fabric gathers neatly into hanging louvres that can be opened and closed swiftly and neatly. Makeover a white bathroom by using it as the perfect canvas for the polar, supplementing it with silver fixtures and fittings; or create a gorgeous cool hue in the guest bedroom, where your visitors will love to wake up to this refreshing shade.

products.title: Roma, Fuscous Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slate grey and with a classically unadorned design, the sleek blind that is the roma in fuscous grey will bring contemporary cool wherever it's used. Its efficient filter function allows some soft light into the room, easing it in gently without disturbing you. The fuscous grey is miles ahead when it comes to modern style, and will work beautifully with equally trendy yellows and bright pinks, both perfect colour schemes for an up-to-date living room, bedroom, or dining room.

products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Vertical Blind
products.description: There are few hues more uplifting than a gentle, pretty aqua, and that's what roma in aqua haze brings to a room. Light, supple, and tightly woven fabric provides the base for this blind, and hangs beautifully in straight louvres to be opened or closed at your leisure. Awaken to a calm, ocean feel by hanging the aqua haze in your master bedroom, where you can surround it with whites and turquoises; or use in the most contemporary of living or dining rooms, complementing with light woods and soft off-whites.

products.title: Roma, Dawn - Vertical Blind
products.description: Simple and functional, the roma in dawn is ideal for creating privacy without compromising on light. The hardy but lightweight fabric is supple and durable, with a lovely cotton-like feel that emits quality and class in bucketloads. The dawn would look fantastic in the kitchen alongside blacks, whites, and greys for a classic monochrome look; in the dining room amongst bold blues for cool sophistication; or in the home office or bedroom alongside bold reds for a look of atmospheric functionality.
